about_the_game:
Jans Tokenpack 011 - Countryside Villagers


For every big city, there are many small villages that support them by growing crops and livestock. These countryside villages are often filled with interesting characters, and provide great roleplaying opportunities for your players.

A small village is often a great place to start your adventures because there are challenges that better suit the lower levels of your players.

Quests and plothooks can include:

  • "Something has been attacking the farmers lifestock at night."
  • "Every full moon, screams can be heard coming from the local graveyard."
  • "The wolves in the nearby woods are becoming more and more agressive."

Fill your villages with colorful and visually descriptive tokens. You can use them both as a character reference to show to your players, and as playable tokens to portray your NPC's on the map.

This tokenpack contains 20 unique tokens, with 3 variations of each token.
Including:

  • Human Female Farmer
  • Human Male Farmer
  • Halfling Female Farmer
  • Halfling Male Farmer
  • Orc Female Farmer
  • Orc Male Farmer
  • Child Girl
  • Child Boy
  • Human Male Miner
  • Dwarf Male Miner
  • Orc Male Lumberjack
  • Human Male Lumberjack
  • Dwarf Male Blacksmith
  • Orc Female Blacksmith
  • Human Male Fisherman
  • Humen Female Sheepherder
  • Human Male Baker
  • Halfling Female Baker
  • Human Male Gravedigger
  • Human Female Beekeeper
  • Enjoy your adventures!

Converted by: Jan Loos

Released on December 05, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
